Module: FLAG

Methods

<inner> flag(name, is_active)

Set a flag
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
name string
is_active boolean <optional>
 true Flag status, default is True

<inner> flags(detail)

Get flags
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
detail boolean <optional>
 false If true then return flags with detail of it, else only return flags name

<inner> get(name)

Get flag by name
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string
Returns:
Type
* | boolean

<inner> has(name)

Check if a flag is exists
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

<inner> isFlagged(name)

Check if a flag is exists
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string
Returns:
Type
*
